Song.title: When I Survey (Scott)
Song.copyright: Words & Music by Isaac Watts (arr. by Kathryn Scott)

Arrangement.text:
Verse 1: When I surv[Eb]ey [Ebmaj7 Ab] the w[Ab/Bb]ondrous [Eb] cross [Ebsus] [Eb] On which [Bb/D]the P[Cm]rince [Ab] of [Fm7(4)]Glory [Bbsus] died,
[Bb] My [Ab/Bb]rich - [Bb]est [Eb]gain [Ebmaj7 Ab] I count but[Cm] loss,
[Ab] And [Fm7(4)]pour con [Eb]- tempt [Bbsus] on [Bb]all my [Eb] pride. [Ebsus]
Verse 2: [Eb] For[Bbsus]bid [Bb]it, [Eb]Lord, [Ebmaj7 Ab] that [Bbsus]I should [Eb] boast, [Ebsus] [Eb] Save in [Bb/D]the d[Cm]eath, [Ab] of [Fm7(4)]Christ my [Bbsus] God!
[Bb] All [Bb9]the [Bb/D]vain th[Eb]ings [Ebmaj7 Ab] that charm me[Cm] most,
[Ab] I [Fm7(4)]sacri -[Eb] fice [Bbsus] them [Bb]to His [Eb] blood. [Ebsus]
Verse 3: [Eb] See [Bbsus]from [B]His [Eb]head,[Ebmaj7 Ab] His [Ab/Bb]hands, His [Eb] feet, [Ebsus] [Eb] Sorrow [Bb/D]and [Cm]love [Ab] flow [Fm7]mingled [Bb] down! [Bbsus] [Bb] Did [Bb9]e’er [Bb/D]such [Eb]love [Ebmaj7 Ab] and sorrow [Cm] meet, [Ab] Or [Fm7]thorns com [Eb]- pose [Bbsus] so [Bb]rich a [Eb] crown?
{key:F} Verse 4: [Bb/C] Were the [Gm/C]whole [F]realm [Fmaj7 Bb] of [Bb/C]nature [F] mine, [Fsus] [F] That [F/E]were [C/E] a [Dm] of -[C Bb] - - fering [Gm7] far too [Csus] small; [C] Love [F/C]so [C7]a – m[F]az [Fmaj7 Bb]- ing, so div [Dm]- ine, [Bb] De[Gm7(4)]mands my [F] soul, [Gm] demands my [F/A] soul, [Bb] Love demands my [F] soul, [Csus] my [C]life, my [Bb] all. [F2]
Arrangement.searchtext: verse 1 when i survey the wondrous cross on which the prince of glory died my rich est gain i count but loss and pour con tempt on all my pride verse 2 forbid it lord that i should boast save in the death of christ my god all the vain things that charm me most i sacri fice them to his blood verse 3 see from his head his hands his feet sorrow and love flow mingled down did eer such love and sorrow meet or thorns com pose so rich a crown verse 4 were the whole realm of nature mine that were a of fering far too small love so a maz ing so div ine demands my soul demands my soul love demands my soul my life my all
